features.name: Dynamic Form Integration
features.description: Synchronizes input state with the global form state when used within a FormContext, or manages its own state when standalone.

features.name: State Management
features.description: Tracks the current value of the input field and provides a setter function to update the value. Triggers validation and callback functions on state changes.

features.name: Model Creation
features.description: Creates a reusable Model object encapsulating input field metadata, value, type, and validation logic.

features.name: Lifecycle Management
features.description: Automatically registers the input field with the FormContext when mounted and unregisters it upon unmounting, ensuring proper cleanup.

features.name: Standalone or Context-Based Usage
features.description: Supports both standalone usage and integration with a FormContext, making it flexible for different scenarios.
